# Wrapping up {background-color="#62259D"}

## Wrapping up

<br>

In a [dynamic]{.hi-orange} economy, some unemployment is [normal]{.note}.

. . .

  - Future [expectations]{.note} are not perfect, and there will always be a [disconnect]{.note} between available *jobs*, *information* and the *supply* of workers.


. . .

<br>

Among the main types of unemployment, the most [serious]{.note} type is [involuntary]{.hi-slate}.

. . .

  - It [signals]{.note} that the economy is unable to adequately *provision* for all of its members.
